title: London/South Bank
name: Clink Prison Museum
image: https://en.wikivoyage.org/wiki/File:2005-06-21 - United Kingdom - England - London - The Clink Prison Museum.jpg
content: A museum that tries to recreate the conditions of the original prison that used to be on this site from the 12th century until 1780, which was notorious the name of it has since become slang as a generic term for prison. | image=2005-06-21 - United Kingdom - England - London - The Clink Prison Museum.jpg
